titleInfo.title: The Project on Comparative European Electoral History: 1830-1995. A computerised data handbook

mods.abstract: This project is aimed at collecting electoral data for all European countries both in a historical and a regional perspective. Data were made machine readable from the beginning of national elections in the 19th century until the present in a disaggregated form down to the level of electoral districts. The data will we published as an electronic data handbook, comprising full documentation and introductory chapters.

originInfo.publisher: EURODATA Research Archive. Mannheim Centre for European Social Research (MZES)
